com.github.shynixn.petblocks.bukkit.logic.business.listener

Class DamagePetListener

  • com.github.shynixn.petblocks.bukkit.logic.business.listener.DamagePetListener

  • public class DamagePetListener

    Created by Shynixn 2018.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DamagePetListener(PetService petService, PersistencePetMetaService persistencePetMetaService, CombatPetService combatPetService, HealthService healthService)
      Created by Shynixn 2018.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onEntityDamageByEntityEvent(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDamageByEntityEvent event)
      The event gets called when a pet damages another entity. Cancels the damage per default.
      void onEntityReceiveDamageEvent(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDamageEvent event)
      The event gets called when a entity gets damaged. Redirects the damage to the PetBlocks implementation.
      void onPetSpawnEvent(PetPreSpawnEvent event)
      The event gets called when a pet tries to get spawned by a player. Checks if the pet is currently respawning blocked.
